divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in my bedroom floor playing a videogame.Must have around 3:30 A.M. I was charging video camera cause I thought my neighbors were snooping around my house. So i just happened to look out front window,and what looked like a huge,huge bright like a full moon was gliding like a loose balloon. It was maybe 50 yards away from window and it looked like it was in back of my neighbors house. Must have been size of two house's. So I quickly grabbed the video camera and woke up my wife to show her.And I recorded about 30 seconds cause film in camcorder was at end of tape. This happened about five to six years ago. Never thought of reporting itonly because I don't think my photage is that good. But you can see what I recorded. I think I only seen footage maybe twice since I recorded it.I thought maybe a full moon but then I remembered I seen same thing about two nights before that day. So this objesct went from my left to right just gliding slowly and confused the hell out of me. I dont remember if I lost sight of it or not. My wife was mad at me for looking out of window at that time. we just put the blinds back down because i to lift blinds to look outside. After we just laid down and went to sleep. I was kind of scared what if it saw me. Me thinking it was a U.F.O. I freaked out so I didn't look out window again.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Coachella
There were no other sightings in Coachella on or around August 15th 2004
